subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Robinson Cano hit a searing rocket for a triple, and three batters later, Russell Martin clobbered a three-run home run, and the Yankees rolled to their second victory in a row over Milwaukee.
snippet: Robinson Cano hit a searing rocket for a triple, and three batters later, Russell Martin clobbered a three-run home run, and the Yankees rolled to their second victory in a row over Milwaukee.
